title: 16th September 1978: Filming begins on Monty Python’s Life of Brian after George Harrison steps in to provide funding
itunes:summary: Claimed by its fans to be the greatest comedy film of all time, Life of Brian has courted controversy since its release due to its satirical portrayal of religion that is interpreted by some as ...
